verbs.description: [ARG0: The president] [V: got] [ARG2: first lady Melania Trump] [ARG1: a card for her birthday . On My Take] , Clinton Yates shares his thoughts on the gift .
The president got first lady Melania Trump a card for her birthday . [ARGM-LOC: On My Take] , [ARG0: Clinton Yates] [V: shares] [ARG1: his thoughts on the gift] .
